titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: The 'Times' prints the pr√©cis of my Address to the Congregational Board. In the course of the day I received the following telegram from the Bishop of St David's: 'Cordial thanks for incomparably sanest & strongest utterance ever made on disendowment. It permanently lifts up ethical level of discussion & cannot but do untold good all round. Writing.'
